name: nall-e
description:
Dive Downwards, Look for lost Treasure and try Avoid Horrors of the Deep Sea!

Game was made made for 2021 Global Game Jam. Your main quest is to find requested items and to avoid all sorts of hazzards while trying not to run out of Energy!

Credits: RymosLasiniai, Aff2ic7i0n, aGhost, Burter, BotGunas, bauda, Benastenas, JozefPro ir Kefyras
